message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. You get 40% and I get 60%.  It's a good deal for you to start.
Alice, your offer was tempting, but let's be realistic. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  Time is money, and we're both losing out with every passing round.
Okay, Bob, let's be practical. I'll take a little less, 51% to your 49%.  We're losing money fast, so let's settle this now.
